label: Ground Water Monitoring Form
comment: Sholto Comment

label: Site ID
comment: Sholto Comment

label: Time
comment: The Groundwater Monitoring rounds are more like station visits than Baseline Assessments

label: Well Type
comment: STP Lookup & validation

label: Well Head Condition
comment: This is a dated field based on the monitoring round so need to have date in the key

label: Measurement Point Description
required: TRUE (if no entry in row 22 above)

label: Well Diameter
comment: Should the height above ground level (HYDRLMP) be the same as the CASING.DEPTHFROM value??

label: Bailer Type
comment: OVERLOADED FIELD - should be added to V.11 of Hydstra

label: Bladder
comment: OVERLOADED FIELD - should be added to V.11 of Hydstra

label: Other
comment: OVERLOADED FIELD - should be added to V.11 of Hydstra

label: Time
comment: 24hr Time Format [hhmm]

label: Well Sampling
comment: OVERLOADED FIELD - should be added to V.11 of Hydstra

label: Sample Taken (Yes/No)
comment: Does this match up with the are.import.ini allocation?
